Debug.name: Debug
Debug.description: Debug is enabled if url contains `?debug`.

Storage.name: Storage

Timer.name: Timer

classitems.description: Scale factor for game engine (used in Retina and HiRes mode).
classitems.name: scale

classitems.description: If Class has `staticInit` function, it is called before `init` function.
classitems.name: staticInit

classitems.description: Automatically called, when creating new class.
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Minimum time to show preloader. In milliseconds.
classitems.name: timeout

return.description: Returns false, if pool already exists.
Returns false, if pool not found or empty.
Returns false, if pool not found.

params.name: callback
params.description: Callback function to run, when timer ends.

classitems.description: Callback for mouse click and touch tap on the scene stage.
classitems.name: click

classitems.description: Callback for mousedown and touchstart on the scene stage.
classitems.name: mousedown

classitems.description: Callback for mouseup and touchend on the scene stage.
classitems.name: mouseup

classitems.description: Callback for mousemove and touchmove on the scene stage.
classitems.name: mousemove

classitems.description: Callback for mouseout on the scene stage.
classitems.name: mouseout

classitems.description: Stop sound. If name is not defined, stops all sounds.
classitems.name: stopSound

classitems.description: Reset local storage. This removes ALL keys.
classitems.name: reset

classitems.description: System width/height factor, when to use HiRes mode.
classitems.name: hiresFactor

classitems.description: Pause game engine, when page is hidden.
classitems.name: pauseOnHide
